name: CrazyFact
0:
”Alexa open crazy fact”
”Alexa ask crazy fact for a fact”
”Alexa, start crazy fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crazy fact
des:
Crazy Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, open Crazy Facts" or "Alexa ask crazy fact for a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
